{'content_type': 'audio_transcription', 'text': "Hey, ChatGPT. So, I'm wondering if you can help me imagine what I could do in my role with Bloom. I have a new contract with them. I run the bloom.pm accelerator program. I was in charge of doing my research on post-traumatic growth. You can search my work or Bilal Ghalib online to see what I've done in the past. And I'm wondering your opinion in this new program with the Axie program. It's a funder that has been funding us repeatedly in the past, and this is the number four. What we can do to have a good role for me in the program. And if you have any thoughts on that, either research or otherwise.", 'direction': 'in', 'decoding_id': None}

{'content_type': 'audio_transcription', 'text': "It's wonderful to hear about your ongoing work with Bloom. As the Bloom.pm accelerator program has been focusing on post-traumatic growth and is supported by a familiar funder, you have a great opportunity to integrate your expertise into the new program.", 'direction': 'out', 'decoding_id': None}
